title: Sri Lanka President holds discussions with UN Secretary-General and Iranian President
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – President Mahinda Rajapaksa who is in Shanghai, China on an official visit to attend the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia (CICA) met with the Secretary General of the United Nations Ban Ki-moon this evening (May 21).
